description.japanese: ゲームが90%以上の評価を受ける。
description.polish: Jedna z Twoich gier musi otrzymać ogólną ocenę co najmniej 90%.
description.turkish: Oyunlarınızdan birisi en az %90 genel derecelendirme puanı almalıdır.
description.brazilian: Receba uma nota geral de pelo menos 90% em um de seus jogos.

description.english: One of your games must receive an overall rating of at least 100%. [Difficulty: Legendary]
description.german: Entwickle ein Spiel, welches eine Gesamtbewertung von 100% erhält. [Schwierigkeit: Legendär]
description.french: L'un de vos jeux doit recevoir une note globale d'au moins 100 %. [Difficulty: Legendary]
description.italian: Uno dei tuoi giochi deve ricevere una valutazione complessiva di almeno il 100%. [Difficulty: Legendary]
description.spanish: Uno de sus juegos debe recibir una calificación general de al menos 100%. [Difficulty: Legendary]
description.schinese: 开发一款评分为100%的游戏。[Difficulty: Legendary]
description.tchinese: 你有一個遊戲整體評分100%。[Difficulty: Legendary]
description.russian: Одна из ваших игр должна получить общий рейтинг не менее 100%. [Сложность: Легендарная]
description.japanese: ゲームが100%の評価を受ける。（難易度：伝説級）
description.polish: Jedna z Twoich gier musi otrzymać ogólną ocenę co najmniej 100%. [Difficulty: Legendary]
description.turkish: Oyunlarınızdan birisi en az %100 genel derecelendirme puanı almalıdır. [Difficulty: Legendary]
description.brazilian: Receba uma nota geral de pelo menos 100% em um de seus jogos. [Difficulty: Legendary]

description.english: Have at least 1,000,000 fans.
description.german: Habe mindestens 1.000.000 Fans.
description.french: Avoir au moins 1 000 000 de fans.
description.italian: Avere almeno 1.000.000 di fan.
description.spanish: Tener al menos 1,000,000 de fanáticos.
description.schinese: 至少有100万粉丝。
description.tchinese: 粉絲數1百萬以上。
description.russian: У вас не менее 1.000.000 фанатов.
description.japanese: 100万人以上のファンを獲得する。
description.polish: Posiadaj co najmniej 1,000,000 fanów.
description.turkish: Have at least 1,000,000 fans.
description.brazilian: Tenha pelo menos 1.000.000 de fãs.

displayName.english: I Don't Like to Be Alone
displayName.italian: Non mi piace stare da solo
displayName.brazilian: I Don't Like to Be Alone

description.english: Start a multiplayer game with at least one friend.
description.german: Starte ein Multiplayerspiel mit einem Freund.
description.french: Démarrez une partie multijoueur avec au moins un ami.
description.italian: Inizia una partita multiplayer con almeno un amico.
description.spanish: Inicia un juego multijugador con al menos un amigo.
description.schinese: 和至少一个朋友开始多人游戏。
description.tchinese: 跟一名好友開始一個多人遊戲。
description.russian: Начните многопользовательскую игру хотя бы с одним другом.
description.japanese: フレンドと共にマルチプレイヤーモードを開始する。
description.polish: Rozpocznij grę wieloosobową z co najmniej jednym przyjacielem.
description.turkish: En az bir arkadaşınızla çok oyunculu bir oyun başlatın.
description.brazilian: Inicie uma partida multijogador com pelo menos um amigo.

description.english: Start a multiplayer game with four friends.
description.german: Starte ein Multiplayerspiel mit vier Freunde.
description.french: Démarrez une partie multijoueur avec quatre amis.
description.italian: Inizia una partita multiplayer con quattro amici.
description.spanish: Comienza un juego multijugador con cuatro amigos.
description.schinese: 和四个朋友开始一场多人游戏。
description.tchinese: 跟四名好友開始一個多人遊戲。
description.russian: Начните многопользовательскую игру с четырьмя друзьями.
description.japanese: 4人のフレンドと共にマルチプレイヤーモードを開始する。
description.polish: Rozpocznij grę wieloosobową z czterema przyjaciółmi.
description.turkish: Dört arkadaşınızla çok oyunculu bir oyun başlatın.
description.brazilian: Inicie uma partida multijogador com quatro amigos.

description.english: Maximize the popularity of an IP.
description.german: Maximiere die Popularität einer IP.
description.french: Maximiser la popularité d'une IP.
description.italian: Massimizza la popolarità di un IP.
description.spanish: Maximice la popularidad de una IP.
description.schinese: 最大化IP的受欢迎程度。
description.tchinese: 一個作品系列取得最高人氣。
description.russian: Повысьте популярность франшизы до максимума.
description.japanese: IPの人気が最高値に達する。
description.polish: Zmaksymalizuj popularność IP.
description.turkish: Bir IP'nin popülaritesini en üst düzeye çıkarın.
description.brazilian: Maximize a popularidade IP em um de seus jogos.

description.english: Maximize your studio reputation. [Difficulty: Legendary]
description.german: Maximiere deine Studiobewertung. [Schwierigkeit: Legendär]
description.french: Maximisez la réputation de votre studio. [Difficulty: Legendary]
description.italian: Massimizza la reputazione del tuo studio. [Difficulty: Legendary]
description.spanish: Maximice la reputación de su estudio. [Difficulty: Legendary]
description.schinese: 最大化工作室的声誉。[Difficulty: Legendary]
description.tchinese: 取得最高工作室評級。[Difficulty: Legendary]
description.russian: Поднимите репутацию своей студии до максимума. [Сложность: Легендарная]
description.japanese: 会社の評価が最高に達する。（難易度：伝説級）
description.polish: Zmaksymalizuj reputację swojego studia. [Difficulty: Legendary]
description.turkish: Stüdyo itibarınızı en üst düzeye çıkarın. [Difficulty: Legendary]
description.brazilian: Maximize a reputação de seu estúdio. [Difficulty: Legendary]

description.english: Have an employee with an experience of 100% at any skill.
description.german: Habe einen Mitarbeiter, mit einem beliebigen Skill von 100%.
description.french: Avoir un employé avec une expérience de 100% à n'importe quelle compétence.
description.italian: Avere un dipendente con un'esperienza del 100% in qualsiasi abilità.
description.spanish: Tener un empleado con una experiencia del 100% en cualquier habilidad.
description.schinese: 拥有一名具有100级技能等级的员工。
description.tchinese: 有員工任意一個技能經驗100%。
description.russian: Иметь сотрудника со 100% опытом работы в любой области.
description.japanese: 全能力値が最大値に達した社員がいる。
description.polish: Posiadaj pracownika z doświadczeniem 100% w dowolnej umiejętności.
description.turkish: Herhangi bir beceride %100 deneyime sahip bir çalışana sahip olun.
description.brazilian: Tenha um funcionário com experiência de 100% em qualquer habilidade.

description.turkish: Efsanevi bir geliştirici kirala.
